text: Hong Joon-pyo (born 20 November 1953), also spelled as Hong Joon-pyo, is a South Korean politician. He was the presidential nominee of the Liberty Korea Party in the 2017 South Korean presidential election. He unsuccessfully ran for president again in 2025. Hong is often seen similar to U.S. President Donald Trump and has been nicknamed "Hong Trump" due to his campaigning style. He was the Chairperson of the Liberty Korea Party from July 2017 to June 2018. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean politicians
title: Hong Joon-pyo
